title: OMG I CANT TAKE IT ANYMORE! MAKE IT STOP PLEASE!!!!!!
body:
I cant take these one sided games anymore D,:  every single damn game without fail is either my team waiting to surrender at 20 or theirs, why the hell cant we just have a good proper game anymore that isn't lost/won in the first 15 mins??

I just don't understand... 
RIOT: "lets make AD champs stronger, and turrets weaker! that'll make games long and enjoyable! no-one will snowball at all!" -_-

please can we just fix this..
lol just isn't fun anymore.

replies.body: After reviewing all of the evidence in front of me, I have decided that you play hyper aggressively. This leads to you either feeding the hell out of your opponents, or getting fed and snowballing. You want longer games? Adjust your play

you seem to be under the opinion that I'm the only person in the team?
and infact i play more passively than aggressively, so whatever evidence you are using please show it.

The ONLY common factor that every one of your games has, is YOU
So i deducted that if your games have a vastly different pattern to most peoples (especially mine - i have long games), then it must be something in your behaviour

> [{quoted}](name=fattyhotdogs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5aEsAiT8,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-12-04T11:06:57.081+0000)
>
> The ONLY common factor that every one of your games has, is YOU


can we make that into a poster ily
Yes you are correct, the people who are getting these uber fast games are generally hyper aggressive players who cant adapt to the new changes, and blaming riot is easier than learning something new

Dude i have more 30+ minute games then i have 20-30 minute games.

Learn to play smarter, and you may not be the only one on your team, but you can still affect the entire game.

AD champions is not stronger, their item just got buff. The change to the AP items did hurt AP mage and AP assassin but it in no way affected the AP mid meta, just because a lot more AD assassin get play doesn't mean AD champs are stronger. After reading your post, I feel like it's partly your fault for losing the game not just your team mate, and before you come up w/ the "I'm not the only one on this team argument" . This meta consist of a more snowbally effect, you can essentially snowball your whole team by snowballing yourself and killing the enemy team in repetition . A lot of people can single handedly carry a team, you are just one of the people who think "I'm the best" and not try to see your error.

I felt this way. Last patch though. This patch my games have really even out with the odd demolition here and there.

I think it probably had something to do with people getting used to the masteries.

No idea why Riot are adding even more "pushing power"to the minions if you have a lead. Making the game even quicker doesnt seem necessary right now.

Im the oposite, I hate 50 minute games with everyone fully built. They always end up with one team fight that goes one way. And that determines the winner.

This makes lane phase worthless.
